entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 25 TO 30 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT

SOUTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
